Who cares!!
 
 It has been revealed for the Muslims nations the reality of democracy and freedom that US government leads and proclaims.
 
 We knew that the Western Civilization, which decoys the majority, was tyrant morality. 
 
 What American soldiers did to all Muslims with Bush administration conspiracy in Guantanamo and Abu Ghuraib jail and disdaining The Noble Quran is proof of the moral degrading of the Nazi civilization and culture.
 
 Let it be known, that we do not want an apology and investigation in this matter. Because justice has been butchered since the US has launched the war on Islam.
 
 Has anyone see a ruler investigate in his orders!
 
 To let you know that the Islamic governments are not the voice of their free Islamic subjects.
 
 Our Islamic Nations looking forward to the downfall of the arrogant and haughty American idol.
 
 Although we do not have the power you have we do hope in Allah to take away this power that you abuse, and for Allah that is not hard or difficult.
 
 
 Free Muslims
 The English Translation of the meanings of The Noble Quran.
 
 
  All the honour, power and glory belong to Allah, and to His Messenger (Muhammad - peace and mercy be upon him) and to the believers. Part28 Chapter 63.
 
  That is because Allah is the Maula (Lord, Master, Helper, Protector, etc.) of those who believe, and the disbelievers have no Maula. Part 26 Chapter 47
 
  They (the disbelievers, the Jews and the Christians) want to extinguish Allah's Light (with which Muhammad peace and mercy be upon him has been sent ـ Islamic Monotheism) with their mouths, but Allah will not allow except that His Light should be perfected even though the Kafirun (disbelievers) hate (it). Part 10 Chapter 9 
 
  But if they violate their oaths after their covenant, and attack your religion with disapproval and criticism, then fight ( you ) the leaders of disbelief - for surely their oaths are nothing to them - so that they may stop (evil actions). Part 10 Chapter 9
 
  This is so! And for the (transgressors, the disobedient to Allah and His Messenger - disbelievers in the Oneness of Allah, criminals) will be an evil final return (fire). Part 23 Chapter 38.
